name: oculi - Take a break for your eyes
author: Emrah Kutlu
description: Shows a rich notification every 20 minutes, to remember to take a break for your eyes. Based on the 20-20-20 rule. See github for information.

browser_action.default_title:
oculi - Take a break for your eyes

20-20-20 rule:
Every 20 minutes,
for at least 20 seconds
look at something 20 feet away.
